name: SWAP (itch) (CREDE_GAMES)
description:
SWAP is a top-down shooter with unique gameplay mechanics, slow-motion and jump & run elements. Fight your way through nine levels and engage in excitig boss and end fights.

Select between three energies to damage your enemies, be healed by them or to send them to hell with your RageFire. This leads to engaging and exciting gameplay, compared to your usual top-down or twin-stick shooter game. Select the right energy quickly while in action to stay on top.

Use various weapons, abbilities and slow-motion to fight in style. You can use two weapons at a time and freely customize your weapon selection for the primary and secondary attack. Or use traps and the environment to your advantage and manipulate some environmental structures.

Find hidden weapons and collect RageFire to increase your energy recharge rate and your RageFire.

SWAP

Gameplay

SWAP energies (white, black, RageFire)

from procetile to gravity weapons, use two at a time

abbilities: dash, slow-motion and more

traps and other hazards

free allies to help you

lots of enemies

Story

save your captured dearest
